assetHub.description:
Decentralized hub for secure digital asset management on the Polkadot network. 
Secure storage, easy transfer, cross-chain compatibility.
assetHub.name: Asset Hub

authentication.name: Decentralized Authentication
authentication.description: Boost users’ privacy and security with decentralized digital identity.
authentication.emptyTitle: Your project does not have Authentication service yet
authentication.emptyInfo: Add Web3 Authentication and create an API key.

cloudFunctions.description:
Deploy any script or backend app to a secure, scalable, and decentralized cloud network. 
Decentralized cloud, fully scalable, API gateway, cross-chain apps.
cloudFunctions.info: Automate Web3 tasks with lightweight, serverless functions. No setup, no infrastructure—just instant execution.
cloudFunctions.name: Cloud Functions

introduction.title: Code runs, no servers needed
introduction.content: Focus on building—scaling happens automatically.

introduction.title: Trigger actions when things happen
introduction.content: Automate alerts, transactions, and contract events.

introduction.title: Easily connect Web3 and APIs
introduction.content: Hook up smart contracts, databases, and external services.

computing.description: Embrace the future of Web3 off-chain computation. Access the internet, boost performance, fully multichain, and ultimate data security.
computing.info: Run decentralized computations without relying on Big Tech. More power, no downtime, no gatekeepers.
computing.name: Computing

introduction.title: Run heavy tasks, skip the costs
introduction.content: Web3-native computing, no cloud provider needed.

introduction.title: Use what you need, pay as you go
introduction.content: No wasted resources—just flexible computing.

introduction.title: Open, transparent, and trustless
introduction.content: Every task runs on a verifiable, secure network.

embeddedWallet.description:
Easily create secure and decentralized wallets for your users on any chain. 
Web3 wallets, fully decentralized, easy integration, multi-chain support.
embeddedWallet.info: Turn any app into a Web3 powerhouse. Let users interact with crypto—without even knowing what a wallet is.
embeddedWallet.name: Embedded Wallet

introduction.title: Web2 logins, Web3 power
introduction.content: Users sign in easily—Web3 runs in the background.

introduction.title: No private key headaches
introduction.content: Users don’t manage keys—they just use your app.

introduction.title: More signups, less friction
introduction.content: Easier logins, smoother transactions, happy users.

hosting.description: Make your website or app unstoppable and free from third-party impact.
hosting.info: Websites that never go down. Host on Web3 and skip the middlemen, censorship, and downtime. Just a site that works, always.
hosting.name: Hosting
hosting.pricing: Start with 100 credits, then check pricing
hosting.title: Web3 Hosting

introduction.title: Always online, no exceptions
introduction.content: Your site works even when centralized servers don’t - try it as a backup.

introduction.title: No gatekeepers, no limits
introduction.content: Full control over your content, domain, and access.

introduction.title: Go live in seconds
introduction.content: Deploy through a simple UI—no coding skills needed.

indexing.description:
Fast and efficient data indexing for blockchain data. 
Real-time data sync, powerful APIs, on-chain data querying.
indexing.name: Indexing Service

rpc.description:
Reliable and secure remote procedure call service for blockchain interaction. 
Low latency, high availability, multi-chain support.
rpc.name: RPC Service

nft.description: Deploy an NFT collection with just a few clicks and retain the ownership of your files.
nft.info: Your brand, your rules. Create NFTs to engage, reward, and build a community—no blockchain expertise needed.
nft.name: NFTs

introduction.title: Mint NFTs, no stress
introduction.content: Launch in minutes—no coding, no setup, just results.

introduction.title: Give fans something to flex
introduction.content: Reward your audience with collectibles they’ll love.

introduction.title: More than just cool pictures
introduction.content: Use NFTs for VIP access, rewards, and interactive campaigns.

social.description: Connect and communicate with freedom. Experience social networking with secure and decentralized chat functionality.
social.name: Social

storage.description: Make your content permanently accessible and easily shareable.
storage.info: Your files, forever. Store NFT metadata, dApp assets, and user files on a network that never goes down. No middlemen, no limits.
storage.name: Storage

introduction.title: Your files, always backed up
introduction.content: Stored safely worldwide, no single point of attack.

introduction.title: Scales with your project
introduction.content: Fast, secure storage that grows as you do.

introduction.title: Save it once, access it anytime
introduction.content: Files stay pinned—no maintenance needed.

smartContracts.description:
Simplify smart contract deployment across multiple chains. 
Automated verification, multi-chain support, security checks.
smartContracts.info: Automate, tokenize, and build trustless systems—without touching Solidity. Deploy contracts in clicks, no sweat.
smartContracts.name: Smart Contracts

introduction.title: No dev team? No problem!
introduction.content: Launch smart contracts fast—zero coding required.

introduction.title: Pick a chain, any chain
introduction.content: Deploy on any major EVM chain in just a few clicks.

introduction.title: Secure by design
introduction.content: Make changes easily—versioning and upgrades built in.

service.description: Choose the Web3 services to power the infrastructure behind your Web3 project and build using simple APIs, CLI, or SDK by Apillon. Launch a service, receive API keys and start building your next Web3 project.
service.info: Launch a service, receive API keys and start building your next dapp.
